title:
When I call New Hanover County at 910-798-6646 to have my name placed on the H1N1 wait list, why do they:



1.  Ask me what my race is?

2.  Ask me if I am married?



How do the answers to these questions effect my position (and others) on the wait list?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091028/ARTICLES/910289958/1015/NEWS0101?Title=Area-swine-flu-vaccine-waiting-list-grows-to-near-4-000
